{-# LANGUAGE DataKinds #-}
{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}

{-# LANGUAGE NumericUnderscores #-}

{-# LANGUAGE QuasiQuotes #-}

module Test.Integration.Scenario.API.Shelley.Wallets
    ( spec
    ) where

import Prelude

import Cardano.Mnemonic
    ( entropyToMnemonic, genEntropy, mnemonicToText )
import Cardano.Wallet.Api.Types
    ( ApiAddress
    , ApiByronWallet
    , ApiNetworkInformation
    , ApiTransaction
    , ApiUtxoStatistics
    , ApiVerificationKeyShelley (..)
    , ApiWallet
    , ApiWalletUtxoSnapshot
    , DecodeAddress
    , DecodeStakeAddress
    , EncodeAddress (..)
    , WalletStyle (..)
    )

    ( DerivationIndex (..), PaymentAddress, Role (..) )

    ( ByronKey )

    ( IcarusKey )

    ( ShelleyKey )

    ( AddressPoolGap (..) )

    ( PassphraseMaxLength (..), PassphraseMinLength (..) )

    ( SyncProgress (..) )
import Cardano.Wallet.Primitive.Types
    ( walletNameMaxLength, walletNameMinLength )
import Cardano.Wallet.Unsafe
    ( unsafeFromHexText, unsafeXPub )
import Control.Monad
    ( forM, forM_ )
import Control.Monad.IO.Class
    ( liftIO )
import Control.Monad.Trans.Resource
    ( runResourceT )
import Data.Aeson
    ( ToJSON (..) )
import Data.ByteArray.Encoding
    ( Base (Base16), convertToBase )
import Data.ByteString
    ( ByteString )

    ( view, (^.) )

    ( Proxy (..) )

    ( Quantity (..) )

    ( Text )

    ( Word32 )

    ( Natural )

    ( SpecWith, describe )

    ( shouldBe, shouldNotBe )
import Test.Hspec.Extra
    ( it )

        -- Although maxAddressPoolGap = 100k, there are performance issues when
        -- creating/using such wallets. Therefore using max gap that is used in Daedalus.
        -- Performance issues are addressed in ADP-442, ADP-436
        let maxDaedalusGap :: Word32
maxDaedalusGap = (Word32
1_000 :: Word32)
        let addrPoolBig :: Int
